findings.title: Broad IP assignment / ownership transfer language
findings.rationale: Assignment language may transfer ownership of work product or IP rather than granting a limited license.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY All inventions and work product created by Employee during employment shall be assigned to Employer. Employee hereby assigns all rights, title, and interest....

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All inventions and work product created by Employee during employment shall be assigned to Employer. Employee hereby assigns all rights, title, and interest.

findings.title: Non-compete / non-solicit style restriction
findings.rationale: Restrictive covenants can limit future business activity; enforceability varies and is commonly negotiated.

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...10. GOVERNING LAW This Agreement is governed by Washington state law....
findings.context:
UTION
Disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration.

9. ATTORNEYS' FEES
Employer shall be entitled to recover reasonable attorneys' fees in any enforcement action.

10. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by Washington state law.

This Agreement is effective as of June 1, 2024.

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
